trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] To receive Push Notifications from Mobile Engagement, you need to enable `Silent Remote Notifications` in your application.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] To receive Push Notifications from Mobile Engagement, you need to enable `Silent Remote Notifications` in your application.

trans-unit.source: You need to add the remote-notification value to the UIBackgroundModes array in your Info.plist file.
trans-unit.target: You need to add the remote-notification value to the UIBackgroundModes array in your Info.plist file.

trans-unit.source: Right click on the top item in the list (`Information Property List`) and add a new row
trans-unit.target: Right click on the top item in the list (`Information Property List`) and add a new row

trans-unit.source: In the new row enter `Required background modes`
trans-unit.target: In the new row enter `Required background modes`

trans-unit.source: Click on the left arrow to expand the row
trans-unit.target: Click on the left arrow to expand the row

trans-unit.source: Add the following value to the item 0 `App downloads content in response to push notifications`
trans-unit.target: Add the following value to the item 0 `App downloads content in response to push notifications`

trans-unit.source: Once you make the change, the info.plist XML should contain the following key and value:
trans-unit.target: Once you make the change, the info.plist XML should contain the following key and value:
